title: Extract first column (words)
description: From the file 'data/words_and_numbers.csv', extract only the first column (the words). The delimiter is a comma.

input_details.prompt_for_command: Enter the cut command to extract the first column:

hints: The 'cut' command is used to remove sections from each line of files.
You'll need to specify the delimiter (character separating columns) and the field number to extract.
Use '-d' for delimiter and '-f' for field.
